reviewText: HORRID!  DO NOT BUY!  This DVD does not play.  It is not compatible with American DVD players,  I've given it two chances, with the same results both times.  Please,  save yourself the hassle.
I was not abe to play this dvd on my device. I'm not sure how this was transferred or formatted but it is not usable for a standard palyer. I would not recommend this dvd.

This dvd came in excellent shape. The sound quality is great. The visuals are all very helpful. This covers all the fundamentals. On top of it all, the customer service is A+! I initially had received a bad dvd. This was investigated and in return, I got treated better than I expected. This is definitely worth your time and money.

This is an invaluable tool for students learning psychotherapy counselling. It's the first time I can see modern methods of counselling in action since "Gloria" in the sixties and is proving essential source material for my thesis into core methods and the parts they play in integrated counselling. The sessions are REAL sessions with real clients and an opportunity for the counsellor to give feedback, additional info and some student Q&A's
